meta_info.name: DV_TEMPORAL
meta_info.description: Specialised temporal variant of `DV_ABSOLUTE_QUANTITY` whose diff type is `DV_DURATION`.

functions.name: add
functions.meaning: Addition of a Duration to this temporal entity.

functions.name: subtract
functions.meaning: Subtract a Duration from this temporal entity.

functions.name: diff
functions.meaning: Difference between this temporal entity and `_other_`.

attributes.name: accuracy
attributes.description: Time accuracy, expressed as a duration.
